code: import{validateForm}from'@utils/validateUtils';import{validatePhoneNumber}from'@utils/validator';import axios from'axios';import{useMutation}from'react-query';export const LoginFormFields={phone_no:{label:'Enter Your Mobile Number',fieldType:'mobile-number',inputProps:{inputMode:'tel'}}};export const validateLoginFields=(fieldName,formData)=>{switch(fieldName){case'phone_no':return validatePhoneNumber(formData[fieldName]);default:return'';}};export const validateLoginForm=formData=>validateForm(formData,validateLoginFields);export const useSendOTPApi=()=>{return useMutation(info=>axios({method:'POST',url:"/send_user_otp/",data:info.request}));};export const useVerifyOTPApi=()=>{return useMutation(info=>axios({method:'POST',url:"/verify_user_otp/",data:info.request}));};
